Css Loader

Spinners loaders css3 based

  • created: 15/10/2014
  • latest update: 08/10/2015
  • version: 1.2
  • by: SYSCOVER SL
  • email: support@syscover.com

Css Loader is developed to load on screen a waiting spinner plugin for your customers, you have 17 different spinners to suit your designs.

In just 2 minutes you can configure this plugin, with a few steps you will have transitions from page to page on your website.

You also have the option of launching the loader if you are performing an action, to send data by Ajax, wait while a process is running, etc.

A simple, lightweight but very useful plugin, developed in CSS3, compatible with mobile devices and taking advantage of hardware acceleration.

When we are in a higher than screen web, wherever you're Css Loader always placed in the center of the screen.

Features

Css Loader is developed to facilitate handling of spinners and loading effects into your web.

Key features:

  • 17 themes to choose appearance
  • Compatible with mobile devices
  • Absolute positioning, always appears centered
  • With the possibility of using it to expect from processes or transitions between pages
  • For transitions between pages, the background color of the transition is configurable
  • Ability to create your own spinners
  • Spinners no pictures, no gif files
  • If you wish, you have the option to use it with .gif files

Setup

To install the Css Loader plugin you must load the following JS library.

<script type="text/javascript" src="cssloader/js/jquery.cssloader.min.js"></script>

Transitions between pages

If we wish page transitions must load the following css

<link href="cssloader/css/cssloader.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />

In our HTML must include this html code after <body> tag

<div id="pre-cssloader"></div>

And to enable the transition from page must declare the plugin in our JavaScript and set the desired options.

$(document).ready(function() {
    $.cssLoader({
        urlPlugin:  '.',
        theme:      'circle'
    });
});

Performances between processes

To activate it while running a process.

$.cssLoader.show({
    useLayer: false
});

And to hide once the process is complete.

$.cssLoader.hide();

Plugin configuration

Next we will detail all the possible options Css Loader plugin..

$.cssLoader(options, callback);

options

* = Required for proper operation options.

urlPlugin *

Type: String
Default value: '.'
Description: Relative URL path to the Css Loader plugin directory

isImage

Type: Boolean
Default value: false
Description: Relative URL path to the Css Loader plugin directory

theme

Type: String
Default value: 'bubbles'
Description: Theme we want enabled to our spinner, these themes have:

  • '3quarters' (IE10, IE11, Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera)
  • 'alien' (IE10, IE11, Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera)
  • 'atebits' (IE10, IE11, Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera)
  • 'ball' (IE10, IE11, Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera)
  • 'bubbles' (IE10, IE11, Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera)
  • 'carousel' (IE10, IE11, Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera)
  • 'casual' (IE10, IE11, Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera)
  • 'circle' (IE10, IE11, Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera)
  • 'clock' (IE10, IE11, Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera)
  • 'dots' (IE10, IE11, Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera)
  • 'google' (IE10, IE11, Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera)
  • 'heartbeat' (IE10, IE11, Chrome, Safari, Opera)
  • 'metro' (IE10, IE11, Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera)
  • 'rubik' (IE10, IE11, Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera)
  • 'sonar' (IE10, IE11, Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera)
  • 'timer' (IE10, IE11, Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera)
  • 'vumeter' (IE10, IE11, Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera)
  • 'image' (IE10, IE11, Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera) theme to use .gif files
You can see them in this link.

spinnerColor

Type: String
Default value: '#333'
Description: Our desired color spinner, not everyone can set this property

delay

Type: Integer
Default value: 250
Description: Milliseconds it takes for the transitions

useLayer

Type: Boolean
Default value: true
Description: Activates a veiled fullscreen only works with show() function, is necessary charging style "cssloader/css/cssloader.css" to work properly

layerColor

Type: String
Default value: '#ffffff'
Description: If is active screen fogging, this property defines the color, only works with the show() function, to change the color of the layer transition from page to page, change the css file "css/cssloaser.css", property background-color, is necessary charging style "cssloader/css/cssloader.css" to work properly.

Callbacks

You can define an anonymous function within each callback.

$.cssLoader({
    urlPlugin:  '.'
},
function(){
    console.log('callback done!!');
});
$.cssLoader.show({
    useLayer: false
},
function(){
    console.log('show done!!');
});
$.cssLoader.hide(
function(){
    console.log('hide done!!');
});

Create your own theme

You can create your own theme, create a folder in themes folder and put the name of your own theme, then make an elements.php file inside this folder.
The only code that is necessary to keep the following: 

<style type="text/css">
    #loading-spinner {
        margin: -25px 0 0 -25px;
        width: 50px;
        height: 50px;
        position: absolute;
        left: 50%;
        top: 40%;
        z-index:99;
    }
</style>
<div id="loading-spinner">
    <div class="your-css-spinner"></div>
</div>

Change the "your-css-spinner" class by the name of your class and assign the css to create code between <style type="text/css"></style> tags

Use .gif files

You can use .gif files, we created a theme called image, the URL cssloader/themes/image, replaced file loader.gif by your .gif file, and sets the theme loader css property to 'image' 

$(document).ready(function() {
    $.cssLoader({
        urlPlugin:  '.',
        theme:      'image'
    });
});
